Minimal Pair: The person who I met him → The person who I met
Label: [Prescriptive]
Justification: Classic Cantonese transfer; needs explanation of English relative clause structure.

Minimal Pair: The place who I visited → The place that I visited
Label: [Prescriptive]
Justification: Simple substitution; C1 knows 'who' is for people.
Cantonese Source: 我去過嗰度 (single 嗰 for all)

Minimal Pair: The book I bought it → The book I bought
